mainText.attr1: Weapons hold is a ship weapon override, allowing you to turn off weapons.
If the ship is player controlled, you can still fire weapons.
If leader ship's weapon hold is changed, followers inherit.
Weapons fire generates heat - which is detected by heat seeking mines.

Ships have a variety of weapon systems, some weapon systems can't be directly player controlled - for example automated missile turrets. Because there are some tiny stealth elements in the game, and because I could see this being useful in the future (potential mods where ships have limited ammo) I added this feature to further control ships.
